item.title: XR
item.description: Mozilla Hubs Experimente Lernräume Stickstoff Patrik Alter Stickstoff Raum Patrik neuer Stickstoff Raum Lernräume Colin Raum A Raum B Xiaowen Lernräume Raum B Raum B Bitcoin Proof of work vs. Proof of stake https://hub.link/Ko49mHj Non-fungible Tokens (NFTs) https://hub.link/7D8bTwT Hello WebXR Unfortunately, the official WebXR Demo Instance is down. Luckily, I host a private version of it. Just use the right controller and the trigger button (index finger) to navigate. https://tobias-weiss.org/hello-webxr/
